executable.title: Classify Nuclei
executable.description: Classify nuclei in an image based on pre-computed features
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the HistomicsTK project.

file.name: inputModelFile
file.description: Pickled file of the scikit-learn model for classifying nuclei

file.name: inputNucleiFeatureFile
file.description: Input nuclei feature file (*.csv, *.h5) containing the features of all nuclei to be classified

file.name: inputNucleiAnnotationFile
file.description: Input nuclei annotation file (*.anot) containing nuclei annotations in the same order as their features in the feature file

file.name: outputNucleiAnnotationFile
file.label: Output Nuclei Annotation File
file.description: Output nuclei annotation file (*.anot) with the same nuclei in input nuclei annotation file if provided) with nuclei sorted into groups based on class and accompanied by heatmaps of the classification probabilities
